zsh on Ubuntu

12 September 2011

Check your current shell:

$ echo $SHELL

Check the available shells:

$ cat /etc/shells

Install zsh (if not available):

$ sudo apt-get install zsh

Switch to zsh:

$ chsh -s bin/zsh

Logout and Login back
